ygData.subject: Re: Malice & Blacknightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: Malice:  Leads Blacknightmare back to the cockpit and sits down in the chair.  Let s give the computer another try.  It might giv us a better clu as to whose

Malice:  Leads Blacknightmare back to the cockpit and sits down in 
the chair.  "Let's give the computer another try.  It might giv us a 
better clu as to whose ship it is."
Blacknightmare: the femme nodded and sits close to Malice, sho 
offered with smile the blanket
Malice:  "Thanks.  Alright thn, lets start with trying to restart it 
without it's log in command."  starts trying commands on the 
keyboard to the side.
BlackNightmare: the femme remained in silence watching at computer
Malice:  "hmmmm, I can access the core programming, let's see if I 
can access ship's logs or something..."  continues typing and 
watching the screens.
 BlackNightmare: "It's weird...."wispered the femme"I have the 
feeling that you will know how acces this computer better than my 
sis"
Malice:  The male stops for a moment, making the same 
realization.  "Hmmm, but how can that be?  I know only you, 
Hellplague and the others.  The first time I came down to this 
planet was to attack the cannon.  You know that."
Blacknightmare: the femme fell in silence, she didn't know what to 
answer
Malice:  "Oh well.  I can't get any detailed logs or the AI, but I 
think I can access the navagational sensor logs."  He started 
pulling up sensor records, trying to see where this ship was 
previous to to coming here.
BlackNightmare: the femme didn't comment anything and thought if 
wouldn't be better told him all true, right now or wait to 
Hellplague said the right moment.
Malice:  "A bunch of places I've never heard of.  The engines have 
more pasects on them than any other ship I bet.  Man, this guy was 
into running ships into the ground, literally."
BlackNightmare: "Yea it seems that whoever used this ship had 
travaled a lot" said the femme but she deeply had the feeling that 
Malice was the owner of the ship
Malice:  Pauses for a moment, looks at the chair he is sitting in, 
scooting around in it a little.  He then looks up to 
Blacknightmare.  "This is a very comfortable chair.  I like this 
chair."
BlackNightmare: "Then as owner isn't here and seemed that he left 
the ship... we cant ake this ship and take all that we need for our 
base"
Malice:  The male grins then stands up.  "Let it be known, that 
thois is my chair."  He then sits back down, pulling Blacknightmare 
in his lap and covering up in the blanket.
BlackNightmare: the femme smiled and huged him saying "Ok... I don't 
dicuss that "
Malice:  He laughs a litle, and continues checking the logs, 
occasionally pointing something interesting out.
BlackNightmare: the femme looked at Malice and said "It's 
something... Interesting there?"
Malice:  "Just some very interesting places this ship has been.  
Negative suns, trinary star systems, nebulae, the edge of the galaxy 
and beyond.  I wish I saw half th things this ship has.
BlackNightmare: The femme didn't said anything and looking to Malice 
she asked herself if could be possible to give back his memories 
again
Malice:  Looks up to the femme.  "What's the mater?  I'm not being 
too boring, am I?"
BlackNightmare: "Oh noo.... I just... I just... "The femme started 
to cry
Malice:  The male was caught off guard by this.  "Hon, what's the 
matter?  Why are you crying?  I hate it when you cry."
BlackNightmare:  the femme gave Malice a quick kiss and suddenly she 
stood up and and left the room.
Malice:  He watches her leave.  "Suddenly checking the computer 
doesn't seem that interesting."  He gets up and follows after her.
BlackNightmare:  The femme run quickly under the cold rain without 
care the direction, she just like be far of all living beings of 
that planet 
Malice:  Tears off the hatch and runs off after the 
femme.  "Blacknightmare!  Come back!"
Blacknightmare: The femme slow her steps  until she finally stopped. 
She tembled, cold? a broken heart? fear? she didn't know
Malice:  He catches up with her, a little out of breath because he 
is slower than her.  "What... what's wrong?  You scare me when you 
do stuff like that!"
BlackNightmare: "I just can't hide it any longer.... I can't stand 
watch you feel pain 'cause you don't know your past...but I don't  
like lost you... My heart it's broke in two due that"
The hunter drops his to his knees, and looks up to her.  "You and I 
will never part.  I swear it, no matter what."
Blacknightmare: the femme huged him crying.
 Malice:  "If it hurts you, I don't want to know about it, but if 
need be, tell me, back in the ship.  Come on."
Blacknightmare:The femme nodded and while she was waitting for 
Malice, she was temblin due cold
